org.edg.data.replication.optorsim.infrastructure

Class Statistics

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.edg.data.replication.optorsim.infrastructure.Statistics

  • public class Statistics
extends java.lang.Object
    Keeps all the output data from the simulation in the one place, so it can all be printed out with one method call.

    Copyright (c) 2002 CERN, ITC-irst, PPARC, on behalf of the EU DataGrid. For license conditions see LICENSE file or http://www.edg.org/license.html

    Since:
    JDK1.4

      • allStatistics

        public java.util.Set allStatistics()
        Return a set of (recursively) all available statistics, effectively flattening the tree.
        Returns:
        A Set of all the statistics in this tree.

      • allStatistics

        public java.util.Set allStatistics(java.lang.Class classType)
        Obtain all statistics from a given generator Class. The statistics tree is parsed recursively to obtain this Set, so only match statistics within a subtree will be returned.
        Parameters:
        classType - The Class of generator you are interested in.
        Returns:
        The Set of all statistics generated from this Class.

        Method to dump the statistic onto stdout.

        public void recursivePrintStatistics()
        Recursively display all statistics in this tree.
